articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.title: Here’s what’s coming to macOS Tahoe - TechCrunch
articles.description: At Monday's WWDC conference, Apple announced the new macOS Tahoe, which comes with a series of updates related to Apple Intelligence, continuity features with the iPhone, and Spotlight search.
articles.content:

articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Full-screen Xbox handheld UI is coming to all Windows PCs “starting next year” - Ars Technica
articles.description: Microsoft has been experimenting with “handheld mode” for Windows 11 since 2022.
